text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Julie a college support
engineer here at the AWS office in
Dublin today I'm going to show you how
to fix the arrow magic in Valley
principle in policy when editing the
bucket policy of the Amazon simple
storage service bucket when using a
console
let's get started
you receive the arrow in value principle
in policy message when the value of a
principal in your pocket policy is not
valid
to resolve this Arrow confirm the
following
first review the principal elements in
your bucket policy and confirm that the
market policy use supported values for a
principal element
for example make sure that the principal
element use the Amazon resource name of
a AWS identity and assets management
user or raw or an AWS account ID or
extreme extra risk to represent all
users
note that used in the actual risk or
wildcard as a principal value grants
access to all users both authenticated
and anonymous
second be sure that the principal value
is formatted correctly review the
principal elements in the policy and
check that they are formatted correctly
if the principle is one user then the
element must be in this format
if the principle is more than one user
but not all users
then the element must be in this format
if the principle is all users then the
element must be in this format
third check to be sure that the IM user
or row wasn't deleted
if your pocket policy use IM users or
role as principles then confirm that
looks ion identities were not deleted
when you edit and then try to save a
bucket policy with a deleted imarn
you get the invalid principle in policy
Arrow
and finally check that the in principles
account doesn't have an enable AWS
region
if your X-ray bucket is in an AWS region
that isn't enabled by default such as
Cape Town Hong Kong Jakarta Milan or
Bahrain you must confirm that the IM
principles account also has this
non-default regions enabled
and now you know how to fix the error
message in value principle in policy
when editing the bucket policy of the
Amazon simple storage service pocket
when using a console
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
